Dialogue.Page: To the Founding of the New Space Program!
Arcadia: Bring forth courage, never fear.
Bush: There's plenty of things to see and hear.
Pine: Blow fury away with all your breath.
Bark: For caution will guide you away from death.
Twig: Returning after all these years, marching forward, despite our fears.
The history and mysteries of the cosmos awaits us.
